batchuserrights-names: Names of users which should be added to the selected groups
batchuserrights-intro: How to use description on Special:BatchUserRights
batchuserrights-single-progress-update:
Used as success message. Parameters:
* $1 - number of groups
* $2 - username
batchuserrights-add-groups:
Used as success message. Parameters:
* $1 - number of users
* $2 - number of groups
* $3 - list of groups
batchuserrights-userload-error:
Error message if a user could not loaded. Parameters:
* $1 - username
batchuserrights-no-groups: Error message which will be shown if no groups to add has been selected
